author: Kyle Hill
description:
Where are the most radioactive locations in all of the FALLOUT games? How dangerous are they? What do the different radiation rates mean? Noted Nuclear Zaddy Kyle Hill jumps into Fallout New Vegas, Fallout 3, and Fallout 4 to explore and explain the nuclear apocalypse in terms understandable to the modern Gamer.
